extDesc.message: An extension that comes handy while playing Genshin Impact. This extension is not affiliated with HoYoverse.

popupResinState.description: Resin state header in the popup

popupHomeState.description: Serenitea pot coin state in the popup

popupTransformerState.description: Parametric Transformer Recovery Time state in the popup

popupTransformerStateUnit.description: Parametric Transformer Recovery Time state unit. 'D left' will appear as '3D left'.

popupNoTransformer.description: Can't display transformer state because it is not yet obtained alert.

popupLiveStateNotLoggedIn.description: Not logged in to hoyolab error in the popup live state.

popupRedeemCode.description: Redeem code header in the popup

popupRedeemCodeInputBoxTitle.description: Redeem code input box title in popup

popupRedeemCodeInputBoxPlaceholder.description: Redeem code input box placeholder in popup

popupHoyoNoLogin.message: You are not logged in to Hoyolab. Please login first.
popupHoyoNoLogin.description: Popup copy account fail - no cookie.

popupCopySuccessAlert.message: Hoyoverse account data copied. Your account data is only stored inside your browser.

popupCheckIn.description: Check In Menu header in popup.

popupAutoCheckInOn.description: Auto Check In enabled alert in popup

popupAutoCheckInOff.message: Auto Check In is disabled. Enable it so you don't miss out!
popupAutoCheckInOff.description: Auto Check In disabled alert in popup

popupCheckInDone.description: Today's check in done alert in popup.

popupCheckInNotDone.message: Today's check in is not yet done.
popupCheckInNotDone.description: Today's check in not done alert in popup.

popupCheckInLoadFail.message: Can't check whether today's check is finished:
popupCheckInLoadFail.description: Check in finish check fail in popup.

popupVersionLatest.description: Version display in popup. Version will be displayed like 'popupVersionLatest' 1.0.0 'popupVersionCurrent' 1.0.0

popupVersionLatestUnknown.description: Version display in popup. Version will be displayed like 'popupVersionLatestUnkown' 'popupVersionCurrent' 1.0.0

popupVersionCurrent.description: Version display in popup. Version will be displayed like 'popupVersionLatest' 1.0.0 'popupVersionCurrent' 1.0.0

notifCheckInStatusLoadFailTitle.message: Failed to load check in status.
notifCheckInStatusLoadFailTitle.description: Title of check in load fail notification.

notifCheckInStatusLoadFailMessage.message: Failed to load check in status. Not checked-in. Reason:
notifCheckInStatusLoadFailMessage.description: Content of check in load fail notification

notifCheckInStatusLoadFailMessage_NoCook.message: Can't auto check in because hoyoverse account information is not saved.
notifCheckInStatusLoadFailMessage_NoCook.description: Content of check in load fail notification: No cookie.

notifCheckInDoneMessage.message: Check in complete. Note: You should redeem reward in game separately.

notifCheckInNotLoginTitle.description: Auto check in fail due to hoyolab no logged in notification title.

notifCheckInNotLoginMessage.message: You are not logged in to Hoyolab. Can't auto check in.
notifCheckInNotLoginMessage.description: Auto check in fail due to hoyolab no logged in notification content.

optionAutoCheckIn.description: Auto check in header in option page.

optionAutoCheckInSwitch.description: Use auto check in switch in option page.

redeemUrl.description: URL to redeem code page. Link to localized page if available for the language.
